data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Assamacris (Orthoptera: Acrididae: Catantopinae) from Yunnan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mao, Ben-Yong, Ren, Guo-Dong, Ou, Xiao-Hong (2007): Two new species of the genus Assamacris (Orthoptera: Acrididae: Catantopinae) from Yunnan, China. Zootaxa 1516: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177303
